DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS SexFS v2.0 Brief Profile (Female) SFLUB004r Past 30 Days How Difficult to Maintain Lubrication Until Completion of Sexual Activity or Intercourse Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response, in the past 30 days, of how difficult it was to maintain lubrication until completion of sexual activity or intercourse, using a 5-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female) Past 30 Days How Difficult to Maintain Lubrication Until Completion of Sexual Activity or Intercourse Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about how difficult it was for an individual to maintain their lubrication until completion of sexual activity or intercourse._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

Concepts.longName: PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)

Concepts.longName: How Difficult to Maintain Lubrication Until Completion of Sexual Activity or Intercourse
Concepts.definition: A question about how difficult it was for an individual to maintain their lubrication until completion of sexual activity or intercourse.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance per K. Laumann

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes ranging from 1 (Almost never or never) to 5 (Not difficult).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something is or was extremely difficult or impossible.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something is or was extremely difficult or impossible.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something is or was very difficult.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something is or was very difficult.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something is or was difficult.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something is or was difficult.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something is or was slightly difficult.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something is or was slightly difficult.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something is or was not difficult.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something is or was not difficult.
